calorie.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a unit for measuring the amount of energy that food will produce
calorie.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I need to burn off a few calories  (=lose some weight by exercising).
My wife convinced me to finally start counting calories  (=control my weight by being careful about what I eat).
calorie.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the amount of heat that is needed to raise the temperature of one gram of water by one degree Celsius. It is used as a unit for measuring energy.
calorie.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: These yoghurts have approximately 90 calories per pot.
Women tend to count calories more than men.
Even walking will help you to burn up calories.
She's on a low-calorie diet at the moment.
Sweets and chocolates are very high in calories.
Americans get 22% of their daily calories from snacks.
Sugary drinks are full of empty calories.
There are several ways you can reduce your calorie intake.
Pizzas have a very high calorie content.
